20101222170648.000|20101222170649.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY, WE ARE IN A WEIRD
20101222170649.000|20101222170651.000|CC1|CAR ENVIRONMENT.

20101222170656.000|20101222170658.000|CC1|WILL SEE A WHOLE LIST OF CARS

20101222170702.000|20101222170704.000|CC1|NEW RATHER THAN USED.

20101222170708.000|20101222170710.000|CC1|USED CARS OFF THE MARKET.

20101222170715.000|20101222170716.000|CC1|740 TO LOCK INTO THAT CHEAP

20101222170722.000|20101222170723.000|CC1|I WOULD LOOK NEW.

20101222170727.000|20101222170729.000|CC1|A CREDIT UNION AND APPLY FOR    
20101222170729.000|20101222170730.000|CC1|FINANCING.

20101222170737.000|20101222170739.000|CC1|JUST TWO YEARS OLD NOW, THEY'RE 
20101222170739.000|20101222170740.000|CC1|DISCOUNTED BY 50%.

20101222170742.000|20101222170744.000|CC1|MORE, I WOULD STILL RATHER BUY A
